fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a plant to grow each day.
- Choose a plant to use each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you grow a plant, you will be able to use one of its abilities until the end of the next night. If it has a day ability, you may use it the same day you choose to grow it.
- You may grow plants of any Florae or Plant role. You may only grow one plant of the subalignment (Killing).
- You have a private reserve of Sun that you keep to use the Plants' paid abilities. You will naturally produce 1 Sun per day.
